 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּמַם‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּם‎</span> **verb** ==be complete, finished== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***, Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תם‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> derived species and derivatives; compare Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew (rare), Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּמִימָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***perfect***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּם‎</span> [[Gen.47.18|Gen 47:18]] + 3 t. (+ [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאֵשׁ֯ תַּם‎</span> [[Jer.6.29|Jer 6:29]]); 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמּוּ‎</span> [[Deut.2.16|Deut 2:16]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּ֑מּוּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.7.13|2Kgs 7:13]] 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמְנוּ‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67dd»§ 67dd</sup>) [[Num.17.28|Num 17:28]]; [[Ps.64.7|Ps 64:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּ֑מְנוּ‎</span> [[Jer.44.18|Jer 44:18]] ([[Lam.3.22|Lam 3:22]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמּוּ‎</span> [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] Löhr [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתֹּם‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67g»§ 67g</sup>) [[Gen.47.15|Gen 47:15]]; [[Ezek.47.12|Ezek 47:12]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִתֻּם‎</span> [[Ezek.24.11|Ezek 24:11]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67q»§ 67q</sup>; strike out [[BDB#Co|Co]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתֹּם‎</span> [[Gen.47.18|Gen 47:18]]; [[1Kgs.7.22|1Kgs 7:22]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵיתָ֑ם‎</span> [[Ps.19.14|Ps 19:14]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתַּ֫מּוּ‎</span> [[Num.14.35|Num 14:35]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְּמוּ‎</span> [[Deut.34.8|Deut 34:8]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּם‎</span> [[Lev.25.29|Lev 25:29]] + 10 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּםֿ‎</span> [[Isa.18.5|Isa 18:5]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֻּתִּי‎</span> [[Jer.27.8|Jer 27:8]] + 7 t. suffix; — 

**1.** ***be finished, completed***; the writing of words [[Deut.31.24|Deut 31:24]]; [[Deut.31.30|Deut 31:30]] (see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]].; [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Job.31.40|Job 31:40]] building of temple [[1Kgs.6.22|1Kgs 6:22]], compare [[1Kgs.7.22|1Kgs 7:22]] ***fulfilled***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s command (by obedience) [[Josh.4.10|Josh 4:10]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); as auxil. + finite verb = ***completely, wholly, entirely***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמּוּ נִבְתָ֑וּ‎</span> [[Josh.3.16|Josh 3:16]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) ***were wholly cut off***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַמּוּ‎</span> [[Ps.73.19|Ps 73:19]] ***entirely consumed***; followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> infinitive: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמּוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לעבור‎</span> ***were finished in regard to***, etc., i.e. ***were entirely passed over*** [[Josh.3.17|Josh 3:17]]; [[Josh.4.1|Josh 4:1]]; [[Josh.4.11|Josh 4:11]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) [[2Sam.15.24|2Sam 15:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לחמּול‎</span> [[Josh.5.8|Josh 5:8]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) ***entirely circumcised***, [[Num.17.28|Num 17:28]]. 

**2.** ***be finished, come to an end, cease:*** the year, [[Gen.47.18|Gen 47:18]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Lev.25.29|Lev 25:29]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Jer.1.3|Jer 1:3]] the years of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> have no end [[Ps.102.28|Ps 102:28]] days of weeping [[Deut.34.8|Deut 34:8]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), compare [[Lam.4.22|Lam 4:22]] also [[Isa.18.5|Isa 18:5]]; [[Lam.3.22|Lam 3:22]]. 

**3.** ***be complete***, of number, [[1Sam.16.11|1Sam 16:11]]. 

**4.** ***be consumed, exhausted, spent:*** silver [[Gen.47.15|Gen 47:15]]; [[Gen.47.18|Gen 47:18]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); strength [[Lev.26.20|Lev 26:20]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); lead [[Jer.6.29|Jer 6:29]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]]); bread [[Jer.37.21|Jer 37:21]] fruit [[Ezek.47.12|Ezek 47:12]] rust [[Ezek.24.11|Ezek 24:11]]. 

**5.** ***be finished, consumed, destroyed:*** people [[Num.14.33|Num 14:33]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), v[[Num.14.35|Num 14:35]]; [[Num.17.28|Num 17:28]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מות‎</span>). [[Num.32.13|Num 32:13]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Josh.8.24|Josh 8:24]]; [[Josh.10.20|Josh 10:20]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.2.14|Deut 2:14]]; [[Deut.2.15|Deut 2:15]]; [[Deut.2.16|Deut 2:16]]; [[Josh.5.6|Josh 5:6]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[1Kgs.14.10|1Kgs 14:10]]; [[2Kgs.7.13|2Kgs 7:13]]; [[Isa.16.4|Isa 16:4]]; [[Jer.14.15|Jer 14:15]]; [[Jer.24.10|Jer 24:10]]; [[Jer.27.8|Jer 27:8]]; [[Jer.36.23|Jer 36:23]]; [[Jer.44.12|Jer 44:12]] (twice in verse); [[Jer.44.18|Jer 44:18]]; [[Jer.44.27|Jer 44:27]]; [[Ps.9.7|Ps 9:7]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַּמּוּ‎</span>), [[Ps.104.35|Ps 104:35]]. 

**6.** ***be complete, sound, unimpaired***, ethically, [[Ps.19.14|Ps 19:14]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקָּה‎</span>; late). 

**7.** twice, very strangely, si vera 1., transitive: [[Ps.64.7|Ps 64:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תמנו‎</span> ***we have completed*** (read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲתִמֹּנוּ‎</span>); [[Jer.27.8|Jer 27:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַדתֻּֿמֹּי אֹתָם בְּיָדוֺ‎</span> (read with [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתִּי‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲתִמֹּ֫תִי‎</span> [[Ezek.22.15|Ezek 22:15]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵחַמּ֫וּ‎</span> [[2Sam.20.18|2Sam 20:18]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַתֵּם‎</span> [[2Kgs.22.4|2Kgs 22:4]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּתֵּם‎</span> [[Job.22.3|Job 22:3]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67y»§ 67y</sup>); ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָחֵם‎</span> [[Ezek.24.10|Ezek 24:10]] ***construct, id.***, [[Dan.8.23|Dan 8:23]] + [[Dan.9.24|Dan 9:24]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]].); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲִתמְךְ‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67v»§ 67v</sup>) [[Isa.33.1|Isa 33:1]] — 

**1.** ***finish, complete, perfect***, a matter [[2Sam.20.18|2Sam 20:18]] (but **Qal**, ***come to an end***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> interrogative, [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and others); flesh in cooking [[Ezek.24.10|Ezek 24:10]]. 

**2.** ***finish, cease doing*** a thing, followed by participle ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:120b»§ 120b</sup>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺדֵד‎</span> [[Isa.33.1|Isa 33:1]]. 

**3.** ***complete, sum up***, with accusative money [[2Kgs.22.4|2Kgs 22:4]] (other conjectures [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Gi|Gi]]); transgressions [[Dan.8.23|Dan 8:23]] sin [[Dan.9.24|Dan 9:24]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]]; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חתם‎</span>). 

**4.** ***destroy*** uncleanness, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מן‎</span> ***from***, [[Ezek.22.15|Ezek 22:15]]. 

**5.** causative (of **Qal 6**): accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דרכיך‎</span> [[Job.22.3|Job 22:3]] ***make sound thy ways.*** **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתַּמָּם‎</span> [[2Sam.22.26|2Sam 22:26]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> ***deal in integrity with*** = [[Ps.18.26|Ps 18:26]] (late, see **Qal 6**).
